Package chessclient

This package provides a Chess Client for community chess.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Bishop The Bishop class represents the bishop chess piece.
Board The Board class stores the current chess board.
ChessClient The ChessClient class handles the interaction with the server.
ChessPiece The class ChessPiece is the superclass for all chess pieces and the empty field.
EmptyPiece This is an empty field on a chess board.
King The King class represents the king chess piece.
Knight The Knight class represents the knight chess piece.
Pawn The Pawn class represents the pawn chess piece.
Queen The Queen class represents the queen chess piece.
Rook The Rook class represents the rook chess piece.
 

Package chessclient Description

This package provides a Chess Client for community chess.
